BT.managers

Class MainContentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.managers.MainContentController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawingClicks
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CDBottomRightController, PNMainContentModel, UCMainContentModel

    public abstract class MainContentController
extends java.lang.Object
implements DrawingClicks
    Main class for managing man content controllers. It is abstract class, that it's childs will implement Drawing clicks.
    Author:
    Karel Hala
